content.en: Ant-based Optimization: Ant-based algorithms and ant colony optimization have been found to be effective in solving various problems in optical networks. These algorithms can efficiently support dynamic routing and wavelength assignment, improve network optimization, reduce communication overhead, mitigate packet loss, achieve load balancing, reduce energy consumption, optimize resource allocation, minimize fragmentation and blocking probability, improve anycast transmission, and reduce burst loss probability. They offer promising solutions for improving the performance and efficiency of optical networks.
content.da: Myrebaseret optimering: Myrebaserede algoritmer og myrekolonioptimering har vist sig at være effektive til at løse forskellige problemer i optiske netværk. Disse algoritmer kan effektivt understøtte dynamisk routing og bølgelængdetildeling, forbedre netværksoptimering, reducere kommunikationsomkostninger, mindske pakkeforsinkelse, opnå belastningsbalancering, reducere energiforbrug, optimere ressourceallokering, minimere fragmentering og blokering, forbedre anycast-transmission og reducere sandsynligheden for burst-tab. De tilbyder lovende løsninger til at forbedre ydeevnen og effektiviteten i optiske netværk.
